title: tyAga bhOga
sahitya:
tyAga bhOga yAgapriyA aruL yOga varanE


anupallavi

  EkanE anEkanE en idaya jnAna dIpanE Om


caraNam    shOka mOha dAhaminri shuddhOham shuddhOham shuddOham 
enrE shruti kUTTi jIva yAzhai aruvi pOla mITTi AghAyattil 
aNukkaL pOlE ariya shakti kATTi avani vAzhvil amudam UTTa
